@peterblazejewicz Thank you for submitting this PR!

***This is a live comment which I will keep updated.***

## 1 package in this PR

* `is-secret` (*new!*) [on npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/is-secret), [on unpkg](https://unpkg.com/browse/is-secret@latest/)
  - 2 added owners: @wrumsby, ✎@peterblazejewicz
  - Config files to check:
    - [`is-secret/tsconfig.json`](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/46019/files/ceca9f768be945932c692d7dd48fa14b6ff38096#diff-d5cb28ac6bc4842869aa49fee16653bddadedda2f36bf881ddd3ed7cdc6cce6b): couldn't fetch contents

## Code Reviews

This PR adds a new definition, so it needs to be reviewed by a DT maintainer before it can be merged.

## Status

 * ✅ No merge conflicts
 * ✅ Continuous integration tests have passed
 * ✅ Only a DT maintainer can approve changes when there are new packages added

All of the items on the list are green. **To merge, you need to post a comment including the string "Ready to merge"** to bring in your changes.

and I'll merge this PR almost instantly. Thanks for helping out! :heart:
